rules_text:
[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, surveil 1, then draw a card.
When this battle is defeated, at the beginning of the next end step, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield if you’ve cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn.
